title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger             Be a Junior Ranger   Pick up your free Junior Ranger booklet at the National Park Visitor Center or click and print a copy right now.               You can complete many of the bonus activities from home, but you will need to complete all of the "Ranger Activities" to earn your Junior Ranger badge.            Want another challenge? Try some of the activities from the Inupiat Heritage Center's Junior Ranger booklet. The Inupiat Heritage Center is the park's "sister" site located in Barrow Alaska. To learn more about life in Barrow click on the Barrow Junior Ranger booklet to the left.
